HOME.INTRO:
Hi, I am LuisK, mobile and web app architect and plant based marathoner.
Welcome to my website!
Scroll right to run or click a button and Dino will make a sprint to reach the desired section.
He is pretty fast!
HOME.CODING:
Currently I am the Lead Architect at OpenForge.
In the past few years I've worked mainly in software engineering for mobile and web apps.
Have any ideas or want to develop an app? Feel free to contact me!
HOME.RUNNING:
I am also an avid runner.
I ran my first marathon last year in Berlin and currently training for Chicago 2020.
Want to talk about training or cool races? Subscribe to my plant-based running newsletter!`
HOME.COOKING:
...and I love cooking and eating vegan food.
I did the Professional Plant-Based Certification Course by Rouxbe.
Want to talk about awesome food? Subscribe to my plant-based running newsletter!
